text: It's easy to quit smoking. I've done it hundreds of times.
author: Mark Twain

text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

text: When inspiration does not come to me, I go halfway to meet it.
author: Sigmund Freud

text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Illusion is the first of all pleasures.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Success doesn't come to you…you go to it.
author: Marva Collins

text: Music is the soul of language.
author: Max Handel

text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Herman Cain

text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

text: Always forgive your enemies. Nothing annoys them more.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The more you say, the less people remember.
author: François Fénelon

text: Success  is the  ability  to  go  from  failure  to  failure  without  losing  your  enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
author: Henry Ford
